text: BOH stavytʹ dushi do smerti koly kinetsʹ yikhnʹoho zhyttya prybuvaye, ta takozh pid chas sna. Otzhe, Vin bere deyakyy zadniy pid chas yikhnʹoho sna, v toy chas, yak inshi dozvolyayutʹsya shchob prodovzhyty zhyttya do kintsya yikh predetermined tymchasovi. Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty uroky dlya lyudey shcho viddzerkalyuyutʹ
